title: Forgot old email
body: Riot i have forgot my old email linked to this account, i wish to change it to my current one (one that i cant forget). Every time i try to switch it it tells me to go to the old email witch i have no clue how to get on it or remember it. Please help me change it.

replies.body: No worries, we'd like to help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help with account updates and email changes.  We'll respond asap!
